snippet: The supply of safe water in Syria is now one-third of the level it was before March 2011 when the civil war began, Unicef officials said.
abstract: Unicef officials report supply of safe water in Syria is now one-third of level it was before March 2011 when civil war began, and warn of new levels of suffering because of worsening regional drought.
lead_paragraph: The supply of safe water in Syria is now one-third of the level it was before March 2011 when the civil war began, Unicef officials said.

headline.main: Syria: Drought Adds to Woes, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Syria: Drought Adds to Woes, U.N. Says
